alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington, northwestern Hyde, northeastern Beaufort and southwestern Tyrrell Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pungo Lake, or 18 miles southeast of Plymouth, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponzer, Pungo, Pike Road, Leechville, Wenona, Scuppernong, Pungo Lake, Phelps Lake, Alligator Lake and Creswell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
